tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Friendly doctor who explains the issue and advice what to be done and what not 
She is very friendly with patient that is my daughter and made is feel very comfortable and fearless during the process.
Thank you

I was very  happy with Dr Sanjna's treatment for my cousin sister. She was very friendly and answered all our queries and assured my sister who was scared.  She was exceptional in her work and  I would highly recommend this doctor to all my friends and family.

True appreciation to Dr Sanjana & Evershine Dental Clinic, generally there is a perception among public that going to clinic never a good experience, very mute and grumpy staffs and not very welcoming, but the team at Evershine Dental Clinic changing the perception but is changing slowly and my our personal experience with Dr Sanjana K Sreenivasan & her team right from the booking appointment, they made my 6 year old daughter comfortable, keeping her engaged, keeping her informed on what she is going to do at every step, follow-up calls, post treatment checkup, very friendly helped her to go through the treatment in a fun way. Got through their details through Practo & Google , now i feel it was a good decision and fun filled Dental Treatment, Kudos to Dr Arathi Nair and support staff tooI would recommend this team for your Dental clinic needs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Amazing experience. Doctor Sanjna was incredibly patient with my little one, who was a bit nervous about the whole experience. She took the time to explain everything that was going on and made sure my child felt comfortable throughout the appointment.
So staff including Dr Arathi were extremely friendly and approachable
Very friendly dentist, treated my niece with a lot of patience despite all her childish tantrums, highly recommend her for all dental treatments
